name: Paul McDougal Marketing
description:
At Paul McDougal Marketing, we have the experience, creativity and strategic thinking you expect from a full-service advertising and marketing firm. Plus one benefit you don’t expect: we’re human.
We’re genuinely interested in learning about your business, solving your marketing challenges and helping you succeed.  All without delusions of worldwide domination. Talk to us, and you get big ideas without the big attitude.
Now that’s a refreshing way to work.
